content:
# We successfully gathered 10 units of iron ore, bringing our inventory to:
# - 12 wood
# - 5 coal
# - 5 stone
# - 10 iron ore
# - 1 iron plate (previously obtained)

# Now we can return to the stone furnace and insert the iron ore for smelting into iron plates.

# Insert the iron ore into the furnace for smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert all 10 units of iron ore.
print(f"Inventory after inserting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory again.

# After inserting, we should ensure that the furnace has enough coal to smelt the iron ore.
# We already have 5 coal, which should be sufficient for the smelting process.
print(f"Current furnace status: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Inspect the current status of the furnace to verify its operations. 

# We can now monitor the furnace to ensure it is smelting the iron ore into iron plates. 
# Once the smelting is complete, we will have enough iron plates to craft the iron gear wheel and the assembling machine.
